title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Destroy All Their Lands. Ramp All My Lands  Brewer's Kitchen
videos.description:
Brewer's Kitchen destroys all of the opponent's lands while ramping all of his lands.

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/destroy-all-their-lands-ramp-all-my-lands-brewer-s-kitchen
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7040542#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/W6Jw0

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Gruul Ponza in Standard!
videos.description:
Magmatic Hellkite is one mean dragon!! Naturally, we're going to have to team the dragon up with Krenko's Buzzcrusher while we attempt to loop Demolition fields. Hope people are ready for their basic land checks!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/single-scoop-gruul-ponza-in-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7015224#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/p9LUJ
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/aUD61

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Is Mardu Mobilize the Best Aggro Deck from Dragonstorm?  Much Abrew
videos.description:

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: United Battlefront is a Bonkers Card
videos.description:
So maybe making a Collected Company for non-creatures was a little too wild. United Battlefront is definitely a bonkers card that is so much fun to cast!

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: I Make Things that Really Shouldn't be Tokens into Tokens and It's Hilarious  Against the Odds
videos.description:
What are the odds of winning by making an absurd number of Three Blind Mice with the help of Shiko, Flamehold Grappler, and Taigam? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish
